AvengerQuote.author: Tony Stark
AvengerQuote.quote: DOTH MOTHER KNOW YOU WEARETH HER DRAPES?

comments.text: Before calling this quote out on just being a comical line, consider the source.
Speaking of which, certain low-level fans of the franchise try to throw Tony Stark into the same category as Bruce Wayne/Batman.
Steve Rogers, where would the world's mightiest heroes be without your moral compass and tried-and-true sense of duty and honor, as any good soldier should have.
The Incredible Hulk has always been a man of few words, but this one utterance truly captures his might, power, and low tolerance for the likes of Loki.
